generated_description: astro kapoor, legally known as astrokapoor inc., based in noida, uttar pradesh, is a prominent online portal in india specializing in the sale and export of gemstones and associated products. the company offers a wide range of gemstones, including both precious and semi-precious stones, as well as items such as rudraksha, crystals, rosaries, and deities. astrokapoor is known for providing certified loose gemstones at wholesale prices and offers customization options for ring and pendant designs. the company has been operating for over five decades and is recognized globally for its authentic and transparent service.
